document_data.name: ''Red Potion''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''red potion''''' was a rather unique draught that was offered for sale by a traveling merchant during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The actual solution was rather peculiar in appearance.
document_data.Powers:
The imbiber of this potion experienced a number of changes to their physicality and mental faculties. They were struck down with extreme weakness, to the point where they could only carry a few pounds on their person. The potion also left them with very poor judgement and lack of common sense.

The primary benefit of the ''red potion'' was that it enhanced a person's intellect, to a degree that was beyond genius-level. It also offered them significant protection from [[magic]]al [[spell]]s and spell-like effects.

Both of the potion's effects lasted for a full 24 hours.
document_data.History: The ''red potion'' was offered for sale by a merchant at the [[Nashkel carnival]] in the {{YearlinkName|1368}}.
document_data.Reputation: This potion could be considered a great boon for [[sorcerer]]s and other [[arcane spellcaster]]s.
